adminUpdateProject(string,uint256,uint25.details: Called via UmiResolver for MEV protection

cancelProject(string).details: Stops further staking on the project

createProject(string,string,string,uint2.details: Called when admin creates a new project

getAllProjects().details: Used to populate project lists in UI

getProject(string).details: Used to populate project cards in UI

getProjectProgress(string).details: Not in interface but useful for frontend

hideProject(string).details: Doesn't remove data, just hides from public view

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

getUserStake(string,address).notice: Get user's stake in a project (Dashboard display)

hideProject(string).notice: Hide a project from listings (Admin dashboard)
